title: @KateyKhaos DJ Sona music packs
body: Have you or the skins team thought about making new music for DJ Sona? I really like her music right now, but I think it would be cool if you could buy more songs and add it to her playlist :D

replies.body:
Hiya! 

It's certainly not out of the realm of possibility down the road. 

I think the question would be - what kind of music would you want? Similar sounds for each form (harder music for Concussive, softer for Ethereal), or would you want a new suite of music where the three forms are totally different?
I think this would be a fun idea: A special song that plays when DJ Sona has Baron or 5th dragon buffs.
Oooh, that would be awesome. More interaction with the map could be really cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=Bl2O5myo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-13T18:55:33.320+0000)

> I think the question would be - what kind of music would you want? Similar sounds for each form (harder music for Concussive, softer for Ethereal), or would you want a new suite of music where the three forms are totally different?

I was thinking more along the lines of 3 new different forms. Maybe not like electronic/techno sounds? Like maybe classical/rock/indie music like Classic/Pentakill Sona. Or RPG type of music would be cool as well.

Do you think changing the genres of music completely would change the feel of the overall skin? For example - do you feel she's still a DJ? Do you still feel like you'd be playing as a DJ at the club, or would you feel more like a DJ at a celebratory event? 

I'm not saying one is right and one is wrong, just curious to get your opinion on it. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=Bl2O5myo,comment-id=000000030000,timestamp=2015-07-13T21:23:59.547+0000)

> Do you think changing the genres of music completely would change the feel of the overall skin? For example - do you feel she's still a DJ? Do you still feel like you'd be playing as a DJ at the club, or would you feel more like a DJ at a celebratory event? 
> 
> I'm not saying one is right and one is wrong, just curious to get your opinion on it. :]

I feel like she would be more celebratory event, since it allows for diversity in any future music she gets, instead of only being restricted to electronic music. There's only so much you could do within one genre compared to a lot of them.

But that's what her skin was centered around (the electronic music).  The style of her skin specifically relates to that genre.  Putting that skin with different genres would make her feel out of place in her own skin.  I just feel that if you want different music for her, then the only way to go would be electronic.

I want to be able to play this:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=39KK7bjL2s4

Also, make it where you can choose a single ally that HAS to listen to your music.
ROFL, pls no. This is just torture. :P

DJ Sona got completely boring after a few games. The music get repetitive and no one bothers to turn it on anymore. 
They really need to atleast allow u to buy new music for it
And I'd recommend harder music. Ethereal is just plain old boring

Personally, I want some Metal on Pentakill Sona that would play in similar fashion to DJ Sona. I think that could be a cool theme in general for Sona, branching from DJ Sona. How cool would that be?

Each skin in general with their own theme of music.
